title: Millie's cauliflower cheese
ingredients: ['1 large cauliflower, leaves removed and cut into florets', '45g (1 1/2 oz) plain flour', '60g (2 oz) butter', '300ml full fat milk', '120g (4 oz) full flavoured cheese, grated', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '3/4 teaspoon English mustard', '1 handful fresh breadcrumbs', '4 streaky bacon rashers', 'crusty bread, to serve']
